name: Guns 'n Droids
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD to move 

Left Click to shoot

Space to hold up shield

1, 2, 3, 4, 5 for switching weapons through your inventory bar.

I made everything else including code, artwork, audio, and music. This is a platformer shooter where you go through levels full  of trigger happy robots to collect a plant that can save earth !

What assets I didn't make: shotgun sound machine gun sound footsteps sound bg music pistol sound pixel art font
